# r-card



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property      | Attribute      | Description                      | Type                             | Default     |
| ------------- | -------------- | -------------------------------- | -------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `bodyClass`   | `body-class`   | Custom class name of card body   | `string`                         | `''`        |
| `footer`      | `footer`       | Footer of the card               | `string`                         | `undefined` |
| `footerClass` | `footer-class` | Custom class name of card footer | `string`                         | `''`        |
| `header`      | `header`       | Title of the card                | `string`                         | `undefined` |
| `headerClass` | `header-class` | Custom class name of card header | `string`                         | `''`        |
| `shadow`      | `shadow`       | When to show card shadow         | `"always" \| "hover" \| "never"` | `'always'`  |
